name: sfumato
description: SFUMATO is a SCSS framework for scalable, responsive websites.

scripts.sfumato-build: node echo "Building (dev)... " start && npm run sfumato-transpile && node echo "DONE - transpiled on " done && node echo " " && node echo "Watching (dev)... " start
scripts.sfumato-transpile: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style compact --source-map true styleguide/scss/ --output styleguide/stylesheets/
scripts.sfumato-build-release: node echo "Building (release)... " start && npm run sfumato-transpile && npm run sfumato-minify && node echo "DONE - transpiled and minified on " done && node echo " " && node echo "Watching (release)... " start
scripts.sfumato-transpile-release: node-sass --linefeed lf --output-style compact --source-map true styleguide/scss/ --output styleguide/stylesheets/

author: Michael Argentini
